name: Jazz And Blues
description:
This is an interactive short story, that takes you on the journey of a boy "blue" and a girl "jazz" and their adventures and misfortunes

In essence , this game is inverted control puzzle platformer, bounded together with jazz music and short but true story about love and society

Links:

Facebook page : https://www.facebook.com/pages/Jazz-Blues/

Comic Archive : http://caffeinism.in/jazz-blues/

Music:

Maiden Voyage : Fubar Ghetto

Connections : Refuge

Movie Night : Refuge

In A Turn Of Events : Drift The Trio

Estoy Bien : Fubar Ghetto
